titleStmt.title: A full and true account of the tryal, condemnation, and execution with the last dying words of Augustin King Who was executed neer Hartford-Townsend, on Wednesday March the 21st. 1687/8.
titleStmt.author: King, Augustin, d. 1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by George Croom, at the Blue-Ball in Thames-street, near Baynard's-Castle,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Blue-Ball in Thames-street, near Baynard's-Castle
